sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Fix script to explicitly set the type of PA jobs to "Scores and Text". However this is the default value </description> <name>Set collection type to "Scores and Text"</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[gs.info('Setting the "collect" column to "Both scores and text" in all PA Jobs'); var gr = new GlideRecord('sysauto_pa'); gr.addQuery('run_type', '!=', 'once'); gr.addNullQuery('collect'); gr.setValue('collect', 'scores_text'); gr.updateMultiple(); gs.info('Done setting the value of "collect" column to "Both scores and text"');]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-09-18 14:12:13</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d31a9a5d671103002bc845210585ef7c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set collection type to "Scores and Text"</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Performance Analytics" source="com.snc.pa">4069fc643cf1311068bcf327dfe37fe4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d31a9a5d671103002bc845210585ef7c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-09-18 14:16:49</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
